entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mississauga
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:17 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -2.3°C

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming west 20 this morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning before morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
